greetings.response: Hi there! How can I help you today?

farewells.response: Goodbye! It was nice chatting with you.

responses.message: Hi there! we are a restaurant that sells it's products online and we make reductions for almost expired products :)
reduction percents can go up to 80%
questions: how much reduction can I get
how low the price can get

responses.message: We are doing this for the purpose of keeping our nature safe from polution in the context of SDGs
questions: What is the purpose of this
What is the purpose of your site

responses.message: You can search products by categories from the mega menu or the Allcategories menu. You also have products recommended in the home page. You can modify your account. you can scroll through all the products available <3
questions: how can i see the products
how can i search for products

responses.message: Thank you, I like to hear that, recommend our site to your loved ones
